sentences.en: Among the new men stands boldly out William the Marshal, Earl of Pembroke.
sentences.cn: 在这些新角色中,彭布罗克伯爵,典礼官威廉最出人头地.

sentences.en: But above all , he had recognized the colours of Earl Risingham.
sentences.cn: 最主要的是, 他已经认出了赖辛汉伯爵的旗帜.

sentences.en: Earl Grey, Darjeeling and Jasmine are best-selling traditional teas.
sentences.cn: 伯爵茶、大吉岭茶和茉莉花茶是最畅销的几种传统茶叶。

sentences.en: Earl has numerous stamps in books all around his room.
sentences.cn: 厄尔的房间到处都是夹着很多邮票的书.

sentences.en: Earl Newcomb was a tall , slender, shockheaded young man.
sentences.cn: 厄尔·纽柯布是个细高个儿, 头发蓬松的年轻人.

sentences.en: I'm giving him contracts on you, Rocco, and Earl.
sentences.cn: 我要让他把你, 洛克, 和厄尔都干掉.

sentences.en: In an instant, both child and Earl were gone.
sentences.cn: 一瞬间, 小孩和艾勒都不见了.

sentences.en: The Earl of Arundel's heir was restored to his inheritance and granted the lordship of Chirk.
sentences.cn: 阿伦德尔伯爵的继承人重新取得了继承权,并获封为切克勳爵.

sentences.en: The Earl was a weak and hesitating man.
sentences.cn: 这位伯爵软弱无能,优柔寡断.

sentences.en: The English College is under Earl Marshal.
sentences.cn: 英格兰信章院由EarlMarshal 院长领导.

sentences.en: The works of Donald Keene, Earl Miner, Makoto Ueda, and Hiroaki Sato are invaluable.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德·基恩, 厄尔迈·因纳, 上田·诚, 和佐藤等人的作品,都是很有价值的.

sentences.en: This reply brought the earl in person to Becky's apartment.
sentences.cn: 这一回答把伯爵本人给请到蓓基的房间里来了.

sentences.en: What's this got to do with Earl laying hands on Sherry like that?
sentences.cn: 这和那个叫厄尔的骚扰雪莉有什么关系?

phrases.tran_cn: 伯爵茶（一种红茶）；格雷伯爵（英国贵族头衔）

trans.tran_en: a man with a high social rank
